Idah□ State Cdllege
Pocatello,Idaho
October 29, 1957
1|2|B|4|5j6
1 tea/
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen:
We understand from Syracuse University reports that the final
report concerning administrative policy and production pro¬
cedure of formal courses of instruction by television has
been completely compiled. We also understand that we might
obtain a copy of it from your office.
Would you please send us one copy of this report to:
Roger L. Walters
Co-ordinator of Educational TV
Idaho State College
Pocatello, Idaho
Thank you very much and please inform us accordingly if
there is any charge.
Sincerely,
LaNae Hill
Secretary of Radio-TV
